section.title: DestroyModuleConfig
section.para: Deletes module configuration entries, so that new configuration lines may be entered instead. This also sometimes the only way to turn back some module settings, previously defined. This changes the way a module runs during a fvwm session without restarting. Wildcards can be used for portions of the name as well.
The new non-conflicting syntax allows a delimiter, a colon and optional spaces between the module name and the rest of the line. In this case a module name (or alias) can't have wildcards.
